attributes.action: reduce the need for office-based workers to commute to work each day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of unnecessary daily journeys to work could be eliminated through effective use of broadband technologies, virtual private networks, home working and also flexible working hours.  Both employers and employees could be given tax incentives to reduce or eliminate commuting.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce the need for office-based workers to commute to work each day."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11223.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/end-commuting/
